benchmark_details.name: BARTS CORE
benchmark_details.overview: BARTS CORE is a metric for evaluating generated text that conceptualizes the evaluation as a text generation problem, utilizing pre-trained sequence-to-sequence models to assess fluency, accuracy, and effectiveness of generated content.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To provide a flexible and effective evaluation mechanism for generated text across various dimensions like informativeness and factuality.

data.source: Evaluation on multiple datasets covering 16 datasets from tasks such as machine translation and text summarization.

methodology.calculation: Metrics based on the probability of generating a target text from a source input using pre-trained models.
methodology.interpretation: Higher scores indicate better quality of generated text.
methodology.validation: Empirical results showing effectiveness against existing metrics.
